author: Cleo Abram
description:
How many people have ever lived… and how many of those people are alive right now?

We made a graph! It’s wild.

If you added up all the people who ever lived you’d get about...

Population data sources: Kaneda, Greenbaum, Haub, 2022; United Nations, 2022; and D. L. Poston Jr., Biraben, Jean-Noel, Durand, McEvedy, Thomlinson

#shorts #population #science #history #animation
title: How Many Humans Have Ever Lived?
